Você que tem medo... Não tenha...
Esse jogo é o melhor cagaço que você pode querer na sua vida... o coração bate forte, as pernas tremem, você fica exitado com a possibilidade de fugir e apavorado ao mesmo tempo porque se você for pego... está morto.
Será que ele me viu? Será que vou ser pego? Quem é meu assassino?
Você que tem medo... Não tenha, vamos fugir juntos ou morrer juntos.

I absolutely love Dead by Daylight. The gameplay, the graphics, wearing immersive headphones so I can hear my victims breathing while I stalk them through map after map. I mean yeah, I'm pretty trash at this game. But I love it none the less. My only upset is the match making. Sometimes it takes AGES and there's no real scaling system. I don't play this game much, so I tend to be lower level and I end up getting stuck in groups with players that have maxed out their skill slots and I end up getting absolutely trounced. 

Also a bit more explanation as to the over all game mechanics would be nice, a tutorial maybe. And maybe a 1v4bot or a 4v1 bot to practice??
go play, and enjoy the scary things

É um dos melhores jogos de temática horror misturada com suspense que eu já joguei, entretanto, é um game para ser jogado com amigos, se vc pretende jogar online sem amigos se prepare para enjoar em 1 hora de jogo e nunca mais abrir novamente.

[h1] Review[/h1][hr]
Brilliant cooperative game with very interesting mechanics! Very but very addictive gameplay. Very diverse killer game mechanics. Incredibly strong emotions accompanying the game. Be careful because you risk getting obsessive compulsive disorder. Definitely a game for people with strong nerves.

[h1] Summary[/h1]
[h2] Advantages[/h2]
[list]
    [*]atmospheric boards dripping with horror 
    [*]interesting game mechanics "against the board "
    [*]many interesting characters to play on both the killer and surv sides 
    [*]a wide range of passive skills for both killer and surv 
    [*]great skill exchange system between characters 
    [*]very exciting gameplay especially with friends 
[/list]
[h2] Disdvantages[/h2]
[list]
    [*]sometimes unbalanced characters 
    [*]quite a lot of cheaters
    [*]some toxic players 
[/list]

Its'a trucking good. Best game

This is the sort of game, where you are gonna either love it or you are gonna hate it, I would have nominated this game for the "The Best Game You Suck At Award" category but this game has been out for a few years now....the game can go from decent to insanely frustrating in a matter of seconds, mainly due to some broken perks not so balanced ( scales to highest rank) match-making, this makes playing with friends who are able to dedicate lots more time to the game put more noobish players like me at a bigger disadvantage... I am not looking for EZ games so to speak but looking for more fair games as a rank 14 (high number is lower rank) and cause my friend is rank 5 we can get killers who can be ranked as high as 2 which means I am gonna have a bad time. Lots of people will say this is the kind of game you need to "git gud" at.....in order to get good, you need experience and chance to learn the maps and mechanics and come up with decent strategies, in live games you are too busy doing objectives or in my case getting killed too fast to get a chance to learn, sure you can do a custom game but in order to make the most of it you will need 4 friends total (1 for killer to work with you and 3 more to play the other survivors) to be able to recreate live matches. Aside from all that, my personal opinion of this game is still a grey area to be honest...its more of a love-hate feeling for this game. So while I don't recommend it for players looking for a calmer coop experience, this game can be a blast with friends.
